name: Code Review Assistant
description: Manual code review following BillYourBite standards

actions.prompt:
Conduct thorough code review of BillYourBite app:
1. Check adherence to PEP 8 and project standards
2. Review function organization and single responsibility principle
3. Validate caching implementation (@st.cache_data usage)
4. Assess form handling and validation logic
5. Review student information security and privacy
6. Check UI consistency (emojis, colors, responsive layout)
7. Evaluate error handling and user feedback mechanisms
8. Review file naming and download functionality
9. Validate input sanitization for student data
10. Suggest refactoring opportunities for maintainability
11. Verify accessibility best practices
12. Provide actionable improvement recommendations
